author: tadlos61
title: Lot's of fun
review:
I received this set years ago when I was a child, and had a blast with it! It was very swooshable and I remember enjoying the transformations, and the lights and sounds were a blast!!  Very creative idea with different pieces creating different sounds and images on the screen.  

Overall opinion

I would definitely recommend this set, the most unique Duplo set I've ever encountered! :)
